thread.title: U.S. Supreme Court could weaken unions' fundraising

title: U.S. Supreme Court could weaken unions' fundraising
text:
U.S. Supreme Court could weaken unions' fundraising 3:03pm EST - 01:46 
In a case that could weaken the finances and political clout of organized labor, conservative U.S. Supreme Court justices on Monday indicated strong support for stopping millions of dollars in fees that non-members are forced to pay annually to unions representing public employees. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
In a case that could weaken the finances and political clout of organized labor, conservative U.S. Supreme Court justices on Monday indicated strong support for stopping millions of dollars in fees that non-members are forced to pay annually to unions representing public employees.
